title: IPTC ninjs - News in JSON - version 1.2 (approved, 2019-10-16)

^description_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+.title: Description
^description_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+.description: A free-form textual description of the content of the item. (The string appended to description_ in the property name should reflect the format of the text). nar:description

^body_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+.title: Body
^body_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+.description: The textual content of the news object. (The string appended to body_ in the property name should reflect the format of the text). nar:inlineData or nar:inlineXML

uri.title: Uniform Resource Identifier
uri.description: The identifier for this news object. nar:newsItem@guid

type.title: Type
type.description: The generic news type of this news object. (Value 'component' added in version 1.2 as issue #21.). nar:itemClass

mimetype.title: MIME type
mimetype.description: A MIME type which applies to this news object. nar:contentType

representationtype.title: Representation type
representationtype.description: Indicates how complete this representation of a news item is. No mapping to nar. Specific for ninjs.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: An identifier for the kind of content of this news object. This can be any string but we suggest something identifying the content such as 'text-only' or 'text-photo'. (Investigate if this align with NewsML nar:profile or not.)

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the news object which is identified by the uri property. nar:newsItem@version

firstcreated.title: First created
firstcreated.description: Indicates when the first version of the item was created. (Added in version 1.2 from issue #5). nar:firstCreated

versioncreated.title: Version created
versioncreated.description: The date and time when this version of the news object was created. nar:versionCreated

embargoed.title: Embargoed
embargoed.description: The date and time before which all versions of the news object are embargoed. If absent, this object is not embargoed. nar:embargoed

pubstatus.title: Publication status
pubstatus.description: The publishing status of the news object, its value is *usable* by default. nar:pubStatus

urgency.title: Urgency
urgency.description: The editorial urgency of the content from 1 to 9. 1 represents the highest urgency, 9 the lowest. nar:urgency

copyrightholder.title: Copyright holder
copyrightholder.description: The person or organisation claiming the intellectual property for the content. nar:copyrightHolder

copyrightnotice.title: Copyright notice
copyrightnotice.description: Any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for the content. nar:copyrightNotice

usageterms.title: Usage terms
usageterms.description: A natural-language statement about the usage terms pertaining to the content. nar:usageTerms

ednote.title: Editorial note
ednote.description: A note that is intended to be read by internal staff at the receiving organisation, but not published to the end-user. (Added in version 1.2 from issue #6.) . ednote: nar:edNote

language.title: Language
language.description: The human language used by the content. The value should follow IETF BCP47. nar:language

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the person

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the person

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the person in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

organisation.title: Organisation
organisation.description: An administrative and functional structure which may act as as a business, as a political party or not-for-profit party. nar:subject

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the organisation

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the organisation

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the organisation in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

symbols.title: Symbols
symbols.description: Symbols used for a finanical instrument linked to the organisation at a specific market place

ticker.title: Ticker
ticker.description: Ticker symbol used for the financial instrument

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: Identifier for the marketplace which uses the ticker symbols of the ticker property

^geometry_[a-zA-Z0-9_]+.description: An object holding geo data of this place. Could be of any relevant geo data JSON object definition.

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the place

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the place

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the place in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: A concept with a relationship to the content. nar:subject

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the subject

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the subject

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the subject in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

event.title: Event
event.description: Something which happens in a planned or unplanned manner. nar:?

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the event

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the event

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the event in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the object

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the object

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the object in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

infosource.title: Info source
infosource.description: A party (person or organisation) which originated, modified, enhanced, distributed, aggregated or supplied the content or provided some information used to create or enhance the content. (Added in version 1.2 according to issue #15.) .    infosource:  nar:infoSource

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: The relationship of the content of the news object to the infosource

scheme.title: Schema
scheme.description: The identifier of a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which includes a code for the infosource

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for the infosource in a scheme (= controlled vocabulary) which is identified by the scheme property

title.title: Title
title.description: A short natural-language name for the item. (Added in version 1.2 according to issue #9). nar:itemMeta/title

byline.title: Byline
byline.description: The name(s) of the creator(s) of the content. nar:by

headline.title: Headline
headline.description: A brief and snappy introduction to the content, designed to catch the reader's attention. nar:headline

slugline.title: Slugline
slugline.description: A human-readable identifier for the item. (Added in version 1.2 from issue #4.). nar:slugline

located.title: Located
located.description: The name of the location from which the content originates. nar:located

charcount.title: Character count
charcount.description: The total character count in the article excluding figure captions. (Added in version 1.2 according to issue #27.). nar:charcount

wordcount.title: Word count
wordcount.description: The total number of words in the article excluding figure captions. (Added in version 1.2 according to issue #27.). nar:wordcount

renditions.title: Renditions
renditions.description: Wrapper for different renditions of the news object. nar:remoteContent

^[a-zA-Z0-9]+.description: A specific rendition of the content of the news object. (Description changed in version 1.2 according to issue #17.)

href.title: href
href.description: The URL for accessing the rendition as a resource. nar:remoteContent@ref

mimetype.title: mimetype
mimetype.description: A MIME type which applies to the rendition. nar:remoteContent@contenttype

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for the link to the rendition resource

height.title: Height
height.description: For still and moving images: the height of the display area measured in pixels. nar:remoteContent@height

width.title: Width
width.description: For still and moving images: the width of the display area measured in pixels. nar:remoteContent@width

sizeinbytes.title: Size in bytes
sizeinbytes.description: The size of the rendition resource in bytes

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The total time duration of the content in seconds. (Added in version 1.2. Issue #18). nar:remoteContent@duration

format.title: Format
format.description: Binary format name. (Added in version 1.2. Issue #18). nar:remoteContent@format

associations.description: Content of news objects which are associated with this news object. nar:link
